There is a [[Foxconn]] model on the back of the card.. it may be (and is currently assumed to be) [http://www.scribd.com/doc/109301245/Manual T77H348.03] The BT driver for [[Dell]] includes USB IDs for 4 products. *0cf3:3002 - DW1702 - [[Dell Wireless 1702 (DW1702)]] Bluetooth 3.0 + HS *0cf3:3004 - WB263 - [[Dell Wireless 1535C (DW1535C)]] Bluetooth Device *'''0cf3:e003''' - '''WB222''' - '''Dell Wireless 1901 (DW1901)''' Bluetooth *0cf3:e004 - WB225 - [[Dell Wireless 1703 (DW1703)]] Bluetooth [http://listing.driveragent.com/c/pci/168c/0034 ''Atheros AR5B22/WB222 (AR946x) SS] • [http://www.wireless-driver.com/dell-wireless-1601-wifi-bluetooth-win8-driver-ver1000227/ Bluetooth SS]
